Hey, logic and science are both on my side.  It takes a feat of great 
marksmanship to hit such a small, fast-moving target, and the only 
weapon fast enough to intercept a projectile under most circumstances 
is a laser - which many transformers don't even HAVE.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: I'm not certain but I think Card's right.  Although Card, you 
do need to 
> mellow out.  Aerosmith, don't be shooting at shots.  The only way 
to 
> intercept something is with your characters body.
